name: nbgrssvtx
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), c2)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)⊆ c2
⊣ (hs0 ∈(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)→ hs0 ∈ c2)
⊣ d(hs0,(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))
⊣ d(hs0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), c2)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)⊆ c2
⊣ (hs0 ∈(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)→ hs0 ∈ c2)
⊣ d(hs0,(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))
⊣ d(hs0, c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), c2)
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c2)
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)⊆ c2
⊣ d(hs0,(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))
⊣ d(hs0, c2)
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), c2)
-| diffsc(hs0, c2)
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))

|- wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), c2)
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))

comment: The neighbors of a vertex ` K ` in a graph form a subset of all vertices of the graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Feb-2022.)
